summary: Diff adds production env config (VITE_APP_ENV=Live), updates frontend environment detection logic, and introduces a deployment preflight doc + script. It does not show any concrete fix to the underlying production deployment failure beyond these frontend/build-time checks, and it includes unrelated repo metadata updates.

missing_requirements.requirement: Investigate the current “Failed to deploy to production: Deployment error” for Version 22 and apply the minimal code/config changes required so the project can successfully deploy to the Live (production) environment.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any changes to deployment configuration (e.g., dfx.json, CI/CD configs) or backend build/deploy logic, nor does it show the specific root-cause fix for the production deployment error; only frontend env handling and a preflight script are added.

missing_requirements.requirement: A production/live deployment completes successfully without a deployment error, serving the latest frontend build and latest backend canister wasm for Version 22.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence shows that deployment tooling/config was updated or that backend canister build artifacts/deploy steps were corrected; there are no backend or deployment pipeline changes included to ensure the live deployment succeeds and serves the latest wasm.

hallucinated_features.description: Repository/project metadata updates unrelated to fixing deployment or adding the preflight procedure (e.g., project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for deployment fix and a preflight check; updating internal project tracking metadata is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updating frontend-file-summaries.txt with extensive app feature descriptions unrelated to deployment fix/preflight.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly avoid new/unrelated product features; this file appears to be a documentation/summary artifact not required by REQ-1 or REQ-2.
